title: Bottega Veneta Padded Cassette Bag
description: Bottega Veneta padded Cassette crossbody bag in black Nappa Leather. Featuring Maxi Intrecciato design, silver-tone hardware, fold over flap with a push-up button closure. This opens to a black leather interior with a hanging zipper pocket. Approximate dimensions: 27cm(L) x 18cm(H) x 8cm(D), and 58cm adjustable shoulder strap drop. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
